column5: Well we got out ice fishing this weekend on the Grand inside my Marina at Fishmasters In Dunnville (Terry) and did well on Crappies Perch Gills a few OFS Large Mouth and even a nice Bow was caught ...all on Buckshots tipped with a half minnow ....Spring Bobbers are a must and a vex helps big time fish the steal poles and you will be in action ..going to head out on the river tommrow try for some Walleye before I leave south for the winter chasen Marlin and Sailfish
Is that Mr. Chowda with that beauty bow??!!  good stuff Steve!
he's a fish whisperer, that's for sure.
Well we got out ice fishing this weekend on the Grand inside my Marina at Fishmasters In Dunnville (Terry)       is this directed at me
Nice! how think was the ice?
I imagine it would be a battle to ice a bow that size.
that's a nice rainbow,I saw a guy catch a big one at pier 4 through crystal clear ice ,it was a good fight and cool to see the pink cheek and stripe fighting under the ice
Ice is around 6" now or better
